title: 2020 தேசிய மக்கள் தொகை பதிவேட்டில் முஸ்லீம் பண்டிகைகள் திட்டமிட்டே புறக்கணிக்கப்பட்டதா?
author: tamil.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: I read it initially even I got shocked, but later came to know it has something to do as fast checker for birth calculations according to religious festivals. It's missing is true,but d reasons seems to be not malicious. @_sabanaqvi is it,or still something there between d lines?
